mapper.insert: insert into db_project (SID, DESCR, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEGROUP, PRICEGROUP, CONTENTGROUP, PICGROUP, DESIGNGROUP, CHECKGROUP, PUBLICGROUP, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, 'NAME', SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, PRODUCTID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, PRODUCTSKU) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{translategroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricegroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shoptype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{salesource,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productsku,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_project set DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TRANSLATEGROUP = #{translategroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICEGROUP = #{pricegroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENTGROUP = #{contentgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICGROUP = #{picgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESIGNGROUP = #{designgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKGROUP = #{checkgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLICGROUP = #{publicgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATEDIFF = #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SHOPTYPE = #{shoptype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SALESOURCE = #{salesource,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PRODUCTSKU = #{productsku,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, DESCR, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEGROUP, PRICEGROUP, CONTENTGROUP, PICGROUP, DESIGNGROUP, CHECKGROUP, PUBLICGROUP, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, 'NAME', SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, PRODUCTID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, PRODUCTSKU from db_project where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, DESCR, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEGROUP, PRICEGROUP, CONTENTGROUP, PICGROUP, DESIGNGROUP, CHECKGROUP, PUBLICGROUP, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, 'NAME', SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, PRODUCTID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, PRODUCTSKU from db_project
